subject: Alpine Skiing
Education (K-12)
Snowboarding
Freestyle Skiing
lead_paragraph: Vail Ski and Snowboard Academy in Colorado, which replicates the European sport-specific model, is considered to be the only public winter sports school in the United States.
snippet: Vail Ski and Snowboard Academy in Colorado, which replicates the European sport-specific model, is considered to be the only public winter sports school in the United States.
